fields.summary: ABFS: AbfsConfiguration should store account type information (HNS or FNS)
fields.description: Currently, both {{AbfsClient}} and {{AzureBlobFileSystemStore}} store information about whether the account is FNS or HNS (i.e., whether namespace is enabled). This information should instead be stored at the {{AbfsConfiguration}} level, allowing both the client and the store to retrieve it from there when needed.

   Currently, we keep the namespaceEnabled information at both the client and store levels, updating it in both locations when a filesystem is created. With this PR, we've moved this information to the ABFS configuration class, allowing anyone who needs it to access it from there. This update helps minimize confusion and removes data redundancy.
